Polyester short sleeve tee shirts. These will work beautifully for sublimation or heat transfer vinyl. This is a unisex style.

These fit true to size or generous.

180C degrees for 60 seconds

entry.title: Crew Socks for Sublimation - 15 or 30 pair pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: SS
Type:
Price: 34.50 - 58.65 (2 variants)

White polyester crew socks with black ankle and toe caps. Perfect for your full sublimation prints. Each sock comes with a full cardboard jig to make your printing easy.

These socks are one size. They are stretchy and do fit a wide range of adults. 

98% polyester 2% spandex. 

Measurement while stretched on sock jig 17 x 4 inches from toe to top. You can see that they are quite stretched for maximum ink coverage and they do bounce back well once removed from the jigs.

entry.title: Ankle Socks for Sublimation - 15 or 30 pair packs
entry.summary:

Type:

White polyester ankle socks with black ankle and toe caps. Perfect for your full sublimation prints. Each sock comes with a full cardboard jig to make your printing easy.

These socks are one size. They are stretchy and do fit a wide range of adults. 

98% polyester 2% spandex. 

Measurement while stretched on sock jig 11 x 4 inches from toe to top. You can see that they are quite stretched for maximum ink coverage and they do bounce back well once removed from the jigs.

entry.title: Sublimation Patch - 3pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 4.00

Perfect for your custom patches on baseball hats, winter hats, backpacks, shirts, tote bags, and jackets!

Heat Press your design onto the patch at 200c for 60 seconds, medium to firm pressure.

After the patch has been designed, remove protective backing and heat press directly onto garment at approx 150c for 15 seconds medium pressure

White patch with full black border. 1 circle, 1 oval, 1 rectangle.

Approx 6 cm x 9 cm or 2.5 x 3.5 inches

entry.title: PINK Stripe POLYESTER - Light Grey Cabin Style Socks - 12 pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 35.50

12 pairs per pack. 

POLYESTER sock in a traditional cabin or work sock style. 

The socks are approx 95% polyester and 4% spandex.

These come in 3 sizes -

SMALL -  is approximately a ladies' small 4-6 or youth size. 

Medium is approximately a ladies medium 7-9. 

Large is approximately a ladies large 10-11. 

These are soft, stretchy, and comfortable. When in doubt, please refer to measurements.

 180C degrees for 60 seconds

entry.title: BLANK Sublimation Masks ADJUSTABLE 10pack with Ear Adjusters and Hook
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 30.00

These face coverings can be used for sublimation or Siser htv applications.

Double-layer polyester face covering with adjustable ear loops. Flexible and breathable. Soft and comfortable to wear.

Sold in a pack of 10 masks with ear adjuster pieces and a crochet style hook to attach them. See the photo for instructions on how to attach ear adjuster pieces.

Sublimation printing - Press at 205F/400C for 50 seconds. These do not lay flat and need to be pressed one side at a time. Firm pressure is required.

htv - please follow directions from your vinyl manufacturer.

We have included a picture to outline the Canadian Governments requirements. Please be aware of Canadian regulations that your mask must be labeled to show that fabric content - 100% polyester and the manufacturer - Dongguan Galaxy Machinery Co. I would also add - customization by - your name or business name. This information can be provided as a hangtag and does not need to be a permanent tag. 

We have the 19-page testing document for fabrics and chemical content. These were tested to North American and European standards for 210 chemicals of concern. Please don't hesitate to message us for a copy of that report. 

NOT MEDICAL GRADE

100% polyester

Adult Size: 14.9 x 14cm

Child Size: 12.9 x 11.5cm

entry.title: Sublimation Masks with POCKET
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 2.40

These face coverings can be used for sublimation or Siser htv applications.

Double-layer face covering with an opening for a filter. A surgical face mask can be cut to fit inside.

Flexible and breathable. Soft and comfortable to wear.

press at 180C for 60 seconds.

We have included the WHO's first specific recommendations as of June 5th, 2020. This can be achieved by adding a layer of cotton into the filter pocket.

We have included a picture to outline of the Canadian Governments requirements. Please be aware of Canadian regulations that your mask must be labeled to show that fabric content - 100% polyester and the manufacturer - Dongguan Galaxy Machinery Co. I would also add - customization by - your name or business name. This information can be provided as a hangtag and does not need to be a permanent tag. 

We have the 19 page testing document for fabrics and chemical content. These were tested to North American and European standards for 210 chemicals of concern. Please dont hesitate to message us for a copy of that report. 

NOT MEDICAL GRADE

100% polyester

Ladies - 4.25'' x 6.3'' or 10.8 x 13.86cm

Men's (outlined in black) - 5'' x 7.15'' or 12.7 x 18.16cm

Kids - 4'' x 4.75'' or 10.6 x 12.07cm

entry.title: Men's Boxers for Sublimation
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 8.00

Beautiful quality trunk-style boxer briefs for men. Flatlock seams. Perfect for sublimation printing. 
98% polyester 2% spandex
Sizes are based on Saxx Trunk Boxers

Men's underwear.

The black elastic waitband measures 4cm. Below measurements are 1/2 waist measurements taken while pants are laying flat.

*Lay a pair of underwear flat on any surface and measure the width of the elastic waistband from one side across to the other. These are the measurements in cm. 

Small - 32cm waist 

Medium - 34cm waist

Large - 36cm waist

XL - 38cm waist

2XL - 40cm waist

 

Press at 200C for 45 seconds with medium pressure.

**A Sawgrass 400 printer was used to print the image

entry.title: Black Raglan Sleeve/Buffalo Plaid Pants Family Pajamas - POLYESTER for Sub
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 17.00 - 23.00 (20 variants)

2 piece pajama set - Shirt is 100% Polyester

Perfect for Sublimation!

Please review the size charts and when in doubt size up! Please keep in mind that the size chart number is based on the pajamas lying flat on a table and being measured on one side.

We are hearing that the children's sizes are true to size but that larger adult sizes fit close to the body. If you want a loose fit or are in doubt, size up.

This style does have a scoop neckline that becomes more obvious as you move up into the plus sizes. While considered unisex, many feel this gives this style a very feminine look.

180C degrees for 60 seconds

No refunds if you ordered the wrong size. 

Adult sizes are only available up to 3xl at this time.
